feed.title: My Thai Note - Learning Thai online daily |
feed.subtitle: A collection of notes about learning Thai language online and daily.

entry.title: Welcome to My Thai Note
entry.content:
This blog intend to keep track of what I’m doing daily to improve my Thai but instead of using a note system which will be local and only for me I decided to use the blog format to share my notes with the world.

So feel free to comment posts if you see any mistake or want to add more information to a post.
entry.summary: This blog intend to keep track of what I’m doing daily to improve my Thai but instead of using a note system which will be local and only for me I decided to use the blog format to share my notes with the world.
